post.title: NRMB Newsletter – January 16, 2017

OPEN CHAIRPOSITION: FRUIT SALE CHAIRPeople (2) NEEDED: Contact: Susie Perez – 440-877-1299
LINKS yo
post.content:
OPEN CHAIRPOSITION: FRUIT SALE CHAIRPeople (2) NEEDED: Contact: Susie Perez – 440-877-1299

LINKS you need to know:

  • Mr. Vitale’s Website
  • Band Booster’s Website
  • FaceBook North Royalton Band Boosters -- Like Us!!
  • Other Fundraisers: GFS and Smile.Amazon.com

DATES you need to know:

  • JANUARY 30 – Band Booster Meeting 7pm in Media Center

Marching Band DVDs

Update: we are still waiting on the copyright license for one song. Mr. Vitale is in weekly contact with the copyright company. As soon as it is received, Jumpstart Videos, will produce our DVDs. Thank you for your patience!

OPEN Chairposition

As mentioned above, we are in need of TWO people to chair our Fruit Sale next year. I can honestly say that I have worked with Susie and Karen this year and these gals have TOTALLY organized this committee and have fantastic notes for you to follow for next year. Consider volunteering NOW since both Karen and Susie are available to go over everything with you for next year! Call Amanda Kost 440-864-6543 or Susie Perez 440-877-1299 if you are interested in volunteering. It is a FUN committee!!

Mark Your Calendar - Basket Raffle

Our annual Basket Raffle event will be MAY 6th at the 3Spot in North Royalton. The 3Spot will be giving us the MAIN DINING room for our event this year! So mark your calendar and we will be getting more information out soon.
